extendedInfo.description: Following the worldwide success of its sports games iWare Designs brings you Pro Snooker 2012, probably one of the most realistic and playable snooker and pool games available on mobile devices. Boasting fully textured game environments and full 3D rigid body physics this game is the complete package for both casual and serious gamers.The simple click and play interface allows you to pick up and play the game quickly, or alternatively for the more serious players the game includes cue ball control allowing you to perform more advanced shots including back spin, top spin, left spin (Left english), right spin (Right english) and ball swerve. So whether you want a simple easy and fun snooker game or a full on simulation this game is for you. Download Pro Snooker 2012 now and try it for free, you will not be disappointed. Game Features: â Localized to English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Canadian French and Mexican Spanish.â Full High Def 3D textured environments. â Full 3D physics at 30 FPS. â Practice: Fine tune your game by playing on your own with no rules. â Quick Play: Play a custom match against another friend, family member or computer opponent. â League: Participate in a league event over 7 rounds where the highest points total wins. â Tournament: Test your nerves in a 4 round knockout tournament event. â Configure up to 3 player profiles to keep track of all your statistics. â Each profile contains comprehensive statistics and progression history. â Select your handicap level with 5 levels of aiming and ball guide mark-ups. â Select your preferred post shot camera through your playerâs profile. â Progress through the ranks from Rookie to Legend. Beware you can go down the ranks as well as up. â Play against 25 different computer opponents spread over 5 difficulty levels. â Fully customizable tables, choose from over 100 combinations of table finish effects and baize colors. â Play snooker on regulation 10ft and 12ft rectangular tables. â Test your skills on the non-regulation Casket, Clover, Hexagonal, L-Shaped and Square tables.â Play 6 Red Ball Snooker, 10 Red Ball Snooker and 15 Red Ball Snooker based on WPBAS rules. â Play US 10 Ball and Black Ball pool based on WPA rules. â Play World Eight Ball Pool based on WEPF rules. â Bonus 8ft snooker table for pool games. â Fully featured ball control system allowing back spin, top spin, left spin (Left english), right spin (Right english) and swerve shots. â Choose from various camera views including 3D, Top Cushion and Overhead views. â 20+ game achievements to collect locally. â In game tips and help.

reviews.title: Not worth the money. Well over priced
reviews.comment: Not a bad game but can do better. Add more games like Championship. Power snooker. International snooker. Premier league with real player. And cannon play in middle pocket need sorted.

reviews.title: ADS IN FULL VERSION NO SUPPORT
reviews.comment: Emailed dev weeks ago but got no reply,Sneaky Ads in Full version for nearly \302\2434 I don\'t want any ads :@ No 7ft Pool table and the score bar blocks the view of the table, why put it there when it could go at the top of the screen out the way :/

reviews.title: How can you create a game like this? ?
reviews.comment: You made this game the same like you would put your hand into people pockets. ..shame. .disgraceful. ..uninstall straight away!

reviews.title: Best ever
reviews.comment: I\'ve played loads of these kinds of games and this is the best
reviews.author: Marshall Shaw

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: The graphics are at best sub-standard. The views of the table is ridiculous. There is no way of knowing where you are hitting the ball. Uninstalled within 10 minutes.
reviews.author: Rachit Nagalia

reviews.title: Excellent game, but
reviews.comment: Will definitely be buying full version. Only a couple of minor gripes. Pause is too near the aim line mover and keeps interrupting game play. Also manual chalk is a pain if you forget like I do but this is automatically done on full game. Graphics are superb and game play very smooth. Loads of milage in it compared to most before you get bored of it, if ever. Well done. Wish they were all this good but then again I\'d be skint. One of, if not the best billiard type games I\'ve played.
reviews.author: Mick Steadman

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Decent game but not good enough when your paying for it. You can\'t hit the ball with power into a pocket because it bounces out which is not realistic. The aiming control could be better. The computer is way to easy and and very docile. you rank up to quick I got legend status in two games. Should be a multiplayer option. It would be a 5 star if these were changed
reviews.author: Anthony Moreland

reviews.title: BEST
reviews.comment: feeling real time experience

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: The asking price to unlock the game is far too much for such a mediocre offering. There are other offerings for less money that are better games.
